Social Network Backend System

This system is about the backend development of campus area social network system. In this system...

  1. Login
  2. Register
  3. Displaying Status
  4. Posting Text and Image Status
  5. Commenting and
  6. Help sections are included.

Displaying posted text messages is like Dashboard in the university or schools. For now, there is no account restriction to post messages. The default nuumber of displayed messages will be latest 6 posts at Status show room. Users can click each status to view more detail about the messages and leave comment about the message. Every users must have account to upload status or comment in this system. Each users can create account in Register section and if user already own an account, they just need to login to access full system functions.

This system is developed with Netbean IDE, Dreamweaver, MySQL Database and target on J2EE platform. Before this system use, administrators must setup envrionment for this program to work correctly.

 

by Zayar Phyo.
